argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lpival.p | |- P = ( LPIdeal ` R ) |
| 2 |  | lpiss.u | |- U = ( LIdeal ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_islpir | |- ( R e. LPIR <-> ( R e. Ring /\ U = P ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_lpiss | |- ( R e. Ring -> P C_ U ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_biantrud | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( U C_ P <-> ( U C_ P /\ P C_ U ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqss | |- ( U = P <-> ( U C_ P /\ P C_ U ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6rbbr | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( U = P <-> U C_ P ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_pm5.32i | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ U = P ) <-> ( R e. Ring /\ U C_ P ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_bitri | |- ( R e. LPIR <-> ( R e. Ring /\ U C_ P ) ) |
